EmailTemplate.description: US-0010893 - create a Feature Requests And select a Hive product
EmailTemplate.name: Create A Feature Request Email
EmailTemplate.subject: New Feature Request {!Requirement_Request__c.Name} raised for {!Requirement_Request__c.HIVE_Products__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly: A new feature request {!$Record.Name} has been raised for one of your products. Please review timely and update status. FYI @[{!$Record.OwnerId}] @[{!Get_Product_Owner_Id.Id}]
